topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552031616368724fc25e0100#post_552031616368724fc25e0100
I lost a snake last night so yeah.
Even if the little one was alive I'd have to give it shots under the spine for a month.
I bought the medicine and needles but it died before I could even get home
And it's costly to bring the other two back at the moment.
And yes I have the medicine still but only enough for a small snake

So I must wait and watch and quarantine them

You want to know how you can make unnaturally perfect pancakes?  Put aluminum foil (smooth out the aluminum foil) on a cake pan, then pour in the batter and cook it in the oven.

Last time I made pancakes I got accused of witchcraft.
